title: Dialogue 1
raw: さっ。。さんじゅうななまん。。！？

title: Dialogue 2
raw: ちなみに推奨アンプと合わせると５０万超えね
translated:
By the way the recommended amp to pair it with is over 500,000

By the way the total with the recommended amp is over 500,000

title: Dialogue 4
raw: お客さまからも「なんでヘッドホンがこんな値段するの？」とか
translated: Customers say things such as "Why do these headphones have such a price?"

title: Dialogue 5
raw: 「振動膜に純金より高い素材使ってるの？」とか
translated: and "Are the materials for the membrane more expensive than gold?"

title: Dialogue 6
raw: よく聞かれるんですよ～

title: Dialogue 7
raw:
もちろん素材にもこだわってますが

この値段には他にも理由があるんです
translated:
Of course we're very particular with our raw materials,

The price comes from another reason./Due to

title: Dialogue 11
raw:
実際に作っているところを見ていただければ

きっとご理解いただけると思います
translated:
If you're willing to watch the practice of them being made,

I think you'll surely gain an appreciation for it
